ARTIFACT_CLAWS_OF_FESTUS_DESC_LONG:

A stick of funerary incense, offered to the deceased

Vanquished enemies should be honored with the appropriate wine pairing.
ARTIFACT_OL_FAITHFUL_DESC_LONG:
Equip Slot 1 Weapon Chosen in Hub (Instead of Default Speargun)
(No Effect Without Weapon Drops Enabled)

A rugged holster with the initials 'B.M' engraved

The callous currents of the Noiseless Sea have no qualms with separating a man from his most beloved possession.
ARTIFACT_ORIGIN_COIL_DESC_LONG:
Clip Size: <s0>%

A delicate mechanism facilitating the spontaneous generation of life

The Garden of the Neptune King serves as a sanctuary for seeds taken by the Noiseless Sea before having a chance to germinate.
ARTIFACT_OUR_GET_ALONG_SHIRT_DESC: Automatically Leash Yourself to a Nearby Character
ARTIFACT_OUR_GET_ALONG_SHIRT_DESC_LONG:
A t-shirt large enough to be worn by 2 Salvagers at once

The Salvager training program puts little emphasis on cooperation, believing that fraternal attachment would be detrimental to the company mission.
ARTIFACT_PAIN_SCALE_DESC: Gain Magic Charge upon Receiving Damage
ARTIFACT_PAIN_SCALE_DESC_LONG:
Item Charge: 1 Second for every <s0> Damage Received

A surgically attached LED light widget

During the training process, Salvagers have their pain replaced with an analog display that lights up if they should stop doing whatever they are doing.
ARTIFACT_PEACHWOOD_SWORD_DESC: Release Vengeful Spirit upon Killing and Dying
ARTIFACT_PEACHWOOD_SWORD_DESC_LONG:
Spirit Damage: <s0> on Player Kill, <s1> on Monster Kill

A wooden blade gnarled and knotted by time

Striking at spirits within the Noiseless Sea is a futile undertaking well suited for those looking to pass an eternity.
ARTIFACT_PEER_PRESSURE_DESC_LONG:
An unusual kinship with an unexpected ally

Salvagers have been resorting to increasingly regulation-violating measures to cope with the loneliness of the abyss.
ARTIFACT_PELICAN_PLUSH_TOY_DESC_LONG:
Heal Amplification: +<s0>%

A soft and squeezable plush stuffed with unconditional love

Locked within the confines of a pressure-stable diving suit, a soft touch is indistinguishable from a harsh one.
ARTIFACT_PEPPER_DESC_LONG:
Damage Interval: <s0> Seconds
Damage: <s1>

A blurry cloud of white noise vaguely in the shape of a cat

Bright Ones can take a variety of forms, from colossal stars to the slight blurriness in the corner of your eye.
ARTIFACT_PETRIFIED_PAYLOAD_DESC: Create Explosions upon Killing and Dying, +Explosion Size
ARTIFACT_PETRIFIED_PAYLOAD_DESC_LONG:
Explosion Damage: <s0> on Player Kill, <s1> on Monster Kill
Bonus Explosion Size: +<s2>%

A bulging and volatile stack of decrepit munitions

Management has always had confidence that whatever lies at the bottom of the world could be dealt with using additional firepower.
ARTIFACT_PIFFLER_DESC_LONG:
Projectile Pifflyness: +100%

A flaccid and flimsy trinket with no discernable use

Some salvaged artifacts shed valuable light on the nature of former humanity while others leave historians more confused than before.
ARTIFACT_PLUMPOWDER_DESC: Magic is Fully Charged upon Spawning
ARTIFACT_PLUMPOWDER_DESC_LONG:
A satchel of sweet and acidic crystals

The taste is better when you have less of it than you want.
ARTIFACT_RECYCLER_BOLUS_DESC: Gain Max Hp upon Eggplant Pickup
ARTIFACT_RECYCLER_BOLUS_DESC_LONG:
Max Hp Gained: +<s0>% per Eggplant
Max Hp Limit: +<s1>%

A foul clump of mucus and undigested flesh

The resentful ingredients of the Kamaboko-Ya yearn to have their bodies remade in the shapes of the ones that terrorized them in life.
ARTIFACT_RED_TIDE_TALISMAN_DESC_LONG:
Fire Duration: <s0> Seconds
Fire Damage: <s1> Per Second

A crimson pendant emitting an unhealthful warmth

A sudden influx of life precipitates a sudden influx of death.
ARTIFACT_RING_OF_TESTING_DESC_LONG: THIS ITEM IS USED FOR STRESS TESTING THE GAME. DO NOT USE THIS ARTIFACT.
ARTIFACT_ROYAL_JUJUBE_BANG_DESC_LONG:
Distant Damage: +<s0>%

An ornate ritual scepter carved from the wood of an extinct fruit tree

The three former Gods of the Noiseless Sea salvaged the body of the First Bright One, and as thanks, each received a celestial blessing.
ARTIFACT_SALIGRAM_DESC_LONG:
Damage Resistance: +<s0>%

A petrified shell imbued with the blessing of the Spiral

As currents carry all sunken things to their remote resting places, many seek solace in the belief that, in time, they will all be reunited.
ARTIFACT_SAMURAI_SHARK_DESC_LONG:
Crit Chance: <s0>%
Crit Damage: +<s1>%
Crit Projectile Speed: +<s2>%

The ultimate sharpening tool that puts a razor edge on dull blades

The secret is the tungsten-carbide blades along with a unique angle that gives you a precision edge each and every time.
ARTIFACT_SEAFOAM_PERIAPT_DESC_LONG:
Reload Speed: +<s0>%
Ranged Attack Speed: +<s1>%

A porous charm infused with an uplifting froth

Not even the body of the Whale-God, Callo, could contain the knowledge imparted by the First Bright One and, gradually, the excess drifted away as seafoam.
ARTIFACT_SENESCENT_SHIELD_DESC_LONG:
A tarnished shield that once held symbolic importance for some forgotten reason

Forgotten objects of worship may find new purpose basking in the shadow of the False Sun.
ARTIFACT_SHILLERS_DEATHCAP_DESC_LONG:
Poison Cooldown: <s0> Second
Poison Damage: <s1> Per Second

A tangled fungal protrusion still producing clumps of unsavory spores

Both Bright Ones and those that congregate in their shadows share the desire for self-propagation.
ARTIFACT_SHIP_IN_A_BOTTLE_DESC_LONG:
Ammo Capacity: +<s0>%
Reload Speed: +<s1>%

An intricate model galleon inside of a glass bottle

We require a million little hands to construct the ship and a single big one to break the bottle.
ARTIFACT_SIMPLE_MIND_DESC_LONG:
A blissful and empty state of mind

The key to upwards mobility within the Noiseless Sea is a mind that forgets all troubles.
ARTIFACT_SINKING_FEELING_DESC_LONG:
Fastfall Power: +<s0>%

An abstract and incorporeal sentiment of despair

Salvagers are advised to surrender their memories of land; even if they were to ever resurface, it would not be as they had remembered.
ARTIFACT_SIREN_CHIME_DESC_LONG:
Knockback: -<s0>%

An instrument whose tone changes according to the listener's desires

Within the unused lungs of each Sunk, a pupating siren sings with a voice that its host used to remember well.
ARTIFACT_SKIPPERS_BOX_OF_FUN_DESC_LONG:
Reroll Interval: <s0> Seconds

A bottomless box continually coughing up smoke and weaponry

Humanity humbly accepts this offering, and with it, the firepower to defy the natural succession of higher beings.
ARTIFACT_SOUND_OF_SEAGULLS_DESC_LONG:
Hover Cost: -<s0>%

An echoing cry that makes you nostalgic for a place you've never been

Translated into human language, this sound consists mostly of expletives.
ARTIFACT_SWORD_OF_SYZYGY_DESC_LONG:
Projectile Pierce: +<s0> Enemies
Damage: +<s1>%

A light thrusting-sword with a hilt in the likeness of a lunar eclipse

Inexplicable phenomena are said to occur when sunken Bright Ones align with their heavenly counterparts.
ARTIFACT_TEMPEST_TEAPOT_DESC_LONG:
Airblast Power: +<s0>%
Airblast Size: +<s1>%

A porcelain teapot whose turbulent contents never settle

Stagnation is the foremost obstacle to Management's visions, so sometimes a Salvager is needed to stir the pot.
ARTIFACT_TENUOUS_GRIP_ON_REALITY_DESC: Become Invisible upon Reloading an Empty Clip
ARTIFACT_TENUOUS_GRIP_ON_REALITY_DESC_LO:
Invisibility Duration: <s0>% Reload Time

The creeping realization that your senses are betraying you

The true nature of reality is the moon's reflection in the uppermost pot of a miscalibrated water clock.
ARTIFACT_TOME_OF_PHILOPATRY_DESC_LONG:
A textbook instructing newborns how to develop proper natal homing instincts

The bookshelves of the Pit of Tongues make paper and binding of otherwise unwritten and primal knowledge.
ARTIFACT_TRIGGERFISH_FINGER_DESC_LONG:
Attack Speed: +<s0>%
Reload Speed: +<s1>%

The disembodied digit of a fish known for its propensity for violence

A Salvager can blindly fire any shot in the ocean and still know that they have struck the source of their misfortune.
ARTIFACT_TUNICATE_TUNIC_DESC_LONG:
Knockback Resistance: +<s0>%
Max Hp: +<s1>%

An adhesive piece of clothing ideal for staying in place

The tunicate is known for its tendency to digest its own brain, a habit that marine biologists surmise is the result of an insatiable hunger for brains.
ARTIFACT_TYPHON_FANG_DESC_LONG:
Clip Refilled on Player Kill: <s0>%
Clip Refilled on Monster Kill: <s1>

The razor-sharp tooth of an extinct titan

According to Goldfish scripture, any individual that ascends to the uppermost layer of the world is rewarded with divine form.
ARTIFACT_UNBREATHING_MEMBRANE_DESC_LONG:
A thick and non-porous membrane that smothers all movement

A Sunk is born upon a former person's cessation of breath.
ARTIFACT_VESTIGIAL_CHAMBER_DESC_LONG:
Explosion Delay: <s0> Second
Explosion Damage: <s1>

An obsolete organ used to manipulate density

The currents of the Noiseless Sea carry objects, not according to their buoyancies, but rather the nature of their desires, regrets and experiences.
ARTIFACT_VISE_OF_SHAME_DESC_LONG:
Player Size: -<s0>%

A curved, metal implement intended for use on oneself

Shame and self-hate must be wrung from the ingredients of the Kamaboko-ya to achieve the optimal texture and flavor.
ARTIFACT_VOID_HYPONOME_DESC_LONG:
Airblast Cost: -<s0>%

A rubbery tube used for water propulsion

All mobility within the Noiseless Sea is born from an individual's affinity for or aversion to the all-consuming void.
ARTIFACT_VOLATILE_DERMIS_DESC_LONG:
Lightning Cooldown: <s0> Seconds
Lightning Damage: <s1>
Lightning Chains: <s2> Enemies

A fleshy sheet crackling with an unstable current

Even the incomprehensible beings of the deep can be influenced by a little negative reinforcement.
ARTIFACT_VOW_OF_EMPTY_HANDS_DESC: -2 Weapon Slots, +Clip Size, Reload Speed and Damage
ARTIFACT_VOW_OF_EMPTY_HANDS_DESC_LONG:
Clip Size: +<s0>%
Reload Speed: +<s1>%
Damage: +<s2>%

A wordless oath to provisional pacifism

The commitment to disarmament most benefits the digestion of the beast that eats you.
ARTIFACT_WHITE_SMOKER_DESC_LONG:
Fire Duration: <s0> Seconds
Fire Damage: <s1>
Hover Cost: -<s2>%

An organic tube structure emanating an endless stream of pale smoke

As the only sources of energy in an otherwise closed system, Bright Ones foment new life within the vicinity, usually in their own likeness.
ARTIFACT_WHITE_WHALE_CHARM_DESC_LONG:
Projectile Size: +<s0>%
Damage: +<s1>%
Ranged Attack Speed: -<s2>%

An ornamental artifact carved from the tusk of the white whale

The Whale-God, Callo, dreamt of an eye at the bottom of the sea and the world that lay beneath its unblinking gaze.
ARTIFACT_WRATH_OF_THE_FROGMAN_DESC_LONG:
Missile Interval: <s0> Second
Missile Damage: <s1>

A pair of webbed gloves worn by amphibious assassins

Once feared by all submariners, the Frogman's reign of terror ceased when their coastal hunting grounds became submerged.
ARTIFACT_WRETCHED_REBREATHER_DESC: +Fuel Regeneration when Magic is Charged, +Magic Charge Rate when at Max Fuel
ARTIFACT_WRETCHED_REBREATHER_DESC_LONG:
Fuel Regeneration: <s0> per Second
Magic Charge: <s1> per Second

An unclean respirator threaded haphazardly with tubes and pumps

Reaching the ocean floor is a greater challenge when you must do so with a single breath of air.
ARTIFACT_YIGHT_KITE_DESC_LONG:
A spool of imperceptible, yet durable string

Fishing lines and similar items are collected by the Sunk who use them to tether themselves to the things they value.
CHARACTER_MAXIMILLIAN_DESC: Maximillian Volunteer's formidible chin is obscured by the fish biting his head.
CHARACTER_MOREAU_DESC: Marcel Moreau used to work in a warehouse as the lead box-counter.
CHARACTER_ROCLAIRE_DESC: If the wooden bucket on Roclaire's head is removed, she will die.
CHARACTER_TAKANORI_DESC: Takanori smokes a pack of cigarettes every day.
CHARACTER_TELEMACHUS_DESC: Telemachus is a submarine with a man-shaped ventral extension.
CHARACTER_WANDA_DESC: Wanda is the last surviving bottlenose dolphin.
MODE_HUB_DESC: Select loadout, purchase new weapons, play bonus levels, read procedurally generated poetry.
MODE_BOSS_DESC:
Fight against a series of Boss encounters.

Can be played solo or cooperatively with friends.
MODE_DEATHMATCH_DESC:
Defeat other players to score points.

Players with fewest deaths win tiebreakers.
Can be played with teams or free-for-all.
MODE_SURVIVAL_DESC:
Survive against waves of enemies.

Can be played solo or cooperatively with friends.
MODE_CTF_DESC:
Capture the enemy flag and bring it to your own goal to score points.

Players are split into 2 teams.
Points cannot be scored if the enemy holds your flag.
MODE_EGGPLANT_DESC:
The player with the most eggplants at the end of the game wins.

Eggplants are dropped by a spawner in the map.
Players drop some of their eggplants on death.
MODE_FOOTBALL_DESC:
Push the ball into the enemy team's goal to score points.

Players are split into 2 teams.
Players cannot damage each other with weapons.
Push the naval mine with weapons or airblast.
MODE_GUN_GAME_DESC:
Player weapon cycles when they get kills.

Cycle through all 18 weapons to win the game.
MODE_KINGMAKER_DESC:
Players gain score while holding the crown.

Crown is spawned in the map and dropped when the player holding dies.
MODE_MATRYOSHKA_DESC:
Players are large and get smaller each time they die, respawning instantly in the same location.

Players who get too small are eliminated.
MODE_RESURRECTION_DESC:
Players drop gravestones on death and respawn when revived by allies.

Team wins when all opponents are eliminated.
MODE_TRICK_OR_TREAT_DESC:
Steal candy from enemy team's bucket and return it to your own.

Players are split into 2 teams.
MODE_ARCADE_DESC: Play through a series of levels, buying upgrades between each.
LEVEL_SANDBOX_DESC: A free space to test events and enemies
LEVEL_BOSS_FISH_DESC: Boss fight with a Slightly Larger Fish
LEVEL_BOSS_FALSE_SUN_DESC: Boss fight with the False Sun
LEVEL_BOSS_NEPTUNE_KING_DESC: Boss fight with Neptune King Tyrrazza
LEVEL_BOSS_GILT_SCALED_SERAPH_DESC: Boss fight with the Gilt-Scaled Seraph
